definition: a blunder (especially an actor's forgetting the lines), ruffle (one's hair) by combing the ends towards the scalp, for a full effect
details:
noun
- a blunder (especially an actor's forgetting the lines)
- something of little value or significance
= synonyms: bagatelle, frivolity, frippery
- any light downy material
verb
- ruffle (one's hair) by combing the ends towards the scalp, for a full effect
= synonyms: tease
- erect or fluff up
= synonyms: ruffle
- make a mess of, destroy or ruin
= synonyms: bobble
